Text: Multiplier for Tree growth time like Pines or Oaks (1 for game default). Can be set to below 1 to make the game harder.
Multiplier for Crop growth time like Carrots or Potatoes (1 for game default). Can be set to below 1 to make the game harder.
Multiplier for products growth time like Pine Resin or Berries (1 for game default). Can be set to below 1 to make the game harder.
